message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the product's value to you and the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value you're looking to get for it.

I can see you're really interested in this product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value it holds for me.
